resources.string: This activity would contain all the songs present in the library. When clicking the corresponding play button, the activity_on_play.xml would be launched and the song would sound. The ImageView and the TextView with the title and artist of the selected song in activity_library would be also displayed in the activity_on_play.xml. Only the java code for the first song has been implemented. When clicking on the Clapp icon it would be possible to go to the device storage to find for more songs to add to the library.
By clicking on the image, the Metadata of the song and other useful information would be displayed.
The description of the artist and some lines about the song or album would be displayed here. Maybe a link to youtube could be available to see the official video of the song.
The lyrics of the song would be displayed here in order the listener can sing while hearing the song. Even a link to a website with the lyrics could be available
